hooks.command: SESSION_ID=$(jq -r '.session_id' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$TMUX" ] && [ -n "$SESSION_ID" ]; then mkdir -p ~/.claude/sessions && tmux display-message -p '#{session_name}:#{window_index}.#{pane_index}' > ~/.claude/sessions/${SESSION_ID}.target; fi; WEZTERM_PANE=$(wezterm cli list --format json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.[] | select(.is_active) | .pane_id' | head -1); if [ -n "$WEZTERM_PANE" ] && [ -n "$SESSION_ID" ]; then echo "$WEZTERM_PANE" > ~/.claude/sessions/${SESSION_ID}.wezterm_pane; fi; exit 0
FILE=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty'); if [[ "$FILE" == *.ts || "$FILE" == *.tsx ]]; then npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null && npx eslint --fix "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; fi; exit 0

SESSION_ID=$(jq -r '.session_id' 2>/dev/null); PANE_FILE=~/.claude/sessions/${SESSION_ID}.wezterm_pane; PANE_ID=$(cat $PANE_FILE 2>/dev/null); TARGET_FILE=~/.claude/sessions/${SESSION_ID}.target; TMUX_TARGET=$(cat $TARGET_FILE 2>/dev/null); terminal-notifier -group "claude-${SESSION_ID}" -title 'Claude Code' -subtitle 'Input Required' -message 'Waiting for your input' -sound 'default' -execute "osascript -e 'tell application \"WezTerm\" to activate' && wezterm cli activate-pane --pane-id ${PANE_ID} && tmux select-window -t ${TMUX_TARGET%.*} && tmux select-pane -t ${TMUX_TARGET}"

SESSION_ID=$(jq -r '.session_id' 2>/dev/null); PANE_FILE=~/.claude/sessions/${SESSION_ID}.wezterm_pane; PANE_ID=$(cat $PANE_FILE 2>/dev/null); TARGET_FILE=~/.claude/sessions/${SESSION_ID}.target; TMUX_TARGET=$(cat $TARGET_FILE 2>/dev/null); terminal-notifier -group "claude-${SESSION_ID}" -title 'Claude Code' -subtitle 'Permission Required' -message 'Needs your approval' -sound 'default' -execute "osascript -e 'tell application \"WezTerm\" to activate' && wezterm cli activate-pane --pane-id ${PANE_ID} && tmux select-window -t ${TMUX_TARGET%.*} && tmux select-pane -t ${TMUX_TARGET}"
